answers.answer: Ummm  ITS NOT SUGAR its CARBOHYDRATES that RAISE   BG
Hi,Thanks for your feedback. We'll be sure to pass it along to our Mobile App Development Team.Best,CherylMH Community Mgr
This looks like a great way to track one's glucose levels. Handy.

It'd be great if there was a way to send/extract all of your blood sugar data via email or something, so you can give the whole list to your doctor. As of now, from what I have seen, there is only a way to send the weekly, monthly and 3 month report.  This report is nice but my doctor wants a full list of my blood sugar checks and the time of day. Not just the high, low and average.

question: It's only the first version, so we have a lot of great features coming to the app soon. We’d love your feedback and suggestions.  Please send your comments to me at: MH Community MgrLink to Sugar Sense: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/sugar-sense-diabetes-app-glucose/id880725347?mt=8Thanks,Cheryl
title: Check out our new Diabetes app called Sugar Sense!
